questions.question: What does Monica say about her Aunt Silvia after she passed away?
options: She was a kind and gentle soul
She was a cruel, cranky, old bitch
questions.correct_answer: She was a cruel, cranky, old bitch
questions.explanation: Monica tells her friends that her Aunt Silvia was a cruel, cranky, old bitch after she passed away.

questions.question: What does Phoebe bring to Monica's apartment to play with the dollhouse?
questions.explanation: Phoebe brings a large ceramic dog to play with the dollhouse, which Monica doesn't want because it's too big.

questions.question: Why does Ross take the dollhouse into the bathroom?
questions.explanation: Ross takes the dollhouse into the bathroom to use the shower to put out a fire that has started in the dollhouse.

questions.question: What does Chandler tell Joanna about her mascara?
options: That it gets a gross goop in the corner of her eye
questions.correct_answer: That it gets a gross goop in the corner of her eye
questions.explanation: Chandler tells Joanna that her mascara gets a gross goop in the corner of her eye, which he finds unattractive.

questions.question: What does Joey tell Lauren about his relationship with Kate?
options: That they had a one-night stand
That he's not interested in her
questions.correct_answer: That he's not interested in her
questions.explanation: Joey tells Lauren that he's interested in her and that things have happened with Kate, implying that he's not interested in pursuing a relationship with Kate.

questions.question: What is the name of the actress that Joey is working with?
questions.explanation: The actress that Joey is working with is named Kate.

questions.question: What does Phoebe say about her dollhouse?
options: That it has a slide instead of stairs
questions.correct_answer: That it has a slide instead of stairs
questions.explanation: Phoebe says that her dollhouse has a slide instead of stairs, which she thinks is a unique and fun feature.

questions.question: Why does Rachel want Chandler to call Joanna?
options: Because she wants to set them up on a date
Because Joanna thinks it's Rachel's fault that Chandler hasn't called her
Because Chandler wants to ask Joanna out
questions.correct_answer: Because Joanna thinks it's Rachel's fault that Chandler hasn't called her
questions.explanation: Rachel wants Chandler to call Joanna because Joanna thinks it's Rachel's fault that Chandler hasn't called her, and Rachel wants to clear up the misunderstanding.

questions.question: What does Chandler finally tell Joanna about calling her?
options: That he's not interested in her
That he's already in a relationship
questions.correct_answer: That he's not going to call her
questions.explanation: Chandler finally tells Joanna that he's not going to call her, after Rachel prompts him to be honest with her.

questions.question: What is the name of the room in Phoebe's dollhouse that has a special feature?
questions.explanation: The Licorice Room in Phoebe's dollhouse has a special feature where you can eat the furniture.

questions.question: What happens to the Foster puppets in Phoebe's dollhouse?
options: They get burned in a fire
questions.correct_answer: They get burned in a fire
questions.explanation: The Foster puppets in Phoebe's dollhouse get burned in a fire that starts in the Aroma Room.

questions.question: What does Joey do after he finds out that Kate is not interested in him?
questions.explanation: Joey starts dating Lauren after he finds out that Kate is not interested in him.

questions.question: What does Ross use to try to put out the fire in the dollhouse?
questions.explanation: Ross uses the shower to try to put out the fire in the dollhouse.

questions.question: What does Chandler say about his date with Joanna?
questions.explanation: Chandler says that his date with Joanna was boring and that she's not his type.

questions.question: What does Phoebe say about the dollhouse being on an ancient Indian burial ground?
questions.explanation: Phoebe says that the dollhouse is sitting on an ancient Indian burial ground, which is why it has a ghost.

questions.question: What does Joey say to Kate about their scene together?
questions.explanation: Joey tells Kate that their scene together needs more heat, implying that it needs to be more passionate and romantic.

questions.question: What does Chandler promise Rachel he will do after his date with Joanna?
options: That he will call Joanna again
That he will not call Joanna again
That he will tell Joanna that he's not interested
That he will go on another date with Joanna
questions.correct_answer: That he will tell Joanna that he's not interested
questions.explanation: Chandler promises Rachel that he will tell Joanna that he's not interested in her after their date.

questions.question: What does Rachel do to Chandler to get him to tell Joanna that he's not interested?
questions.explanation: Rachel twists Chandler's nipple to get him to tell Joanna that he's not interested in her.

questions.question: What does Joanna say to Rachel about Chandler?
options: That she's not interested in him
questions.explanation: Joanna tells Rachel that she likes Chandler and is interested in him.

questions.question: What does Phoebe say about the dollhouse after it catches on fire?
questions.explanation: Phoebe is upset and says that the dollhouse is ruined after it catches on fire.

questions.question: What does Kate say to Joey about their night together?
options: That it was just a one-night stand
questions.correct_answer: That it was just a one-night stand
questions.explanation: Kate tells Joey that their night together was just a one-night stand and that she's not interested in him romantically.

questions.question: What does Chandler say to Joanna when he finally tells her that he's not interested?
options: That he's not interested in her
That he's already in a relationship
That he's not ready for a relationship
That he's just not that into her
questions.correct_answer: That he's not interested in her
questions.explanation: Chandler finally tells Joanna that he's not interested in her and that he doesn't think they're compatible.
